properties.name: ALL_MESSAGES
properties.description: members will receive notifications for all messages by default

properties.name: ONLY_MENTIONS
properties.description: members will receive notifications only for messages that @mention them by default

properties.name: DISABLED
properties.description: media content will not be scanned

properties.name: MEMBERS_WITHOUT_ROLES
properties.description: media content sent by members without roles will be scanned

properties.name: ALL_MEMBERS
properties.description: media content sent by all members will be scanned

properties.name: NONE
properties.description: guild has no MFA/2FA requirement for moderation actions

properties.name: ELEVATED
properties.description: guild has a 2FA requirement for moderation actions

properties.name: NONE
properties.description: unrestricted

properties.name: LOW
properties.description: must have verified email on account

properties.name: MEDIUM
properties.description: must be registered on Discord for longer than 5 minutes

properties.name: HIGH
properties.description: must be a member of the server for longer than 10 minutes

properties.name: VERY_HIGH
properties.description: must have a verified phone number

properties.name: NONE
properties.description: guild has not unlocked any Server Boost perks

properties.name: TIER_1
properties.description: guild has unlocked Server Boost level 1 perks

properties.name: TIER_2
properties.description: guild has unlocked Server Boost level 2 perks

properties.name: TIER_3
properties.description: guild has unlocked Server Boost level 3 perks

properties.name: SUPPRESS_JOIN_NOTIFICATIONS
properties.description: Suppress member join notifications

properties.name: SUPPRESS_PREMIUM_SUBSCRIPTIONS
properties.description: Suppress server boost notifications

properties.name: SUPPRESS_GUILD_REMINDER_NOTIFICATIONS
properties.description: Suppress server setup tips

properties.name: SUPPRESS_JOIN_NOTIFICATION_REPLIES
properties.description: Hide member join sticker reply buttons

properties.name: ANIMATED_ICON
properties.description: guild has access to set an animated guild icon

properties.name: BANNER
properties.description: guild has access to set a guild banner image

properties.name: COMMERCE
properties.description: guild has access to use commerce features (i.e. create store channels)

properties.name: COMMUNITY
properties.description: guild can enable welcome screen, Membership Screening, stage channels and discovery, and receives community updates

properties.name: DISCOVERABLE
properties.description: guild is able to be discovered in the directory

properties.name: FEATURABLE
properties.description: guild is able to be featured in the directory

properties.name: INVITE_SPLASH
properties.description: guild has access to set an invite splash background

properties.name: MEMBER_VERIFICATION_GATE_ENABLED
properties.description: guild has enabled  Membership Screening

properties.name: MONETIZATION_ENABLED
properties.description: guild has enabled monetization

properties.name: MORE_STICKERS
properties.description: guild has increased custom sticker slots

properties.name: NEWS
properties.description: guild has access to create news channels

properties.name: PARTNERED
properties.description: guild is partnered

properties.name: PREVIEW_ENABLED
properties.description: guild can be previewed before joining via Membership Screening or the directory

properties.name: PRIVATE_THREADS
properties.description: guild has access to create private threads

properties.name: ROLE_ICONS
properties.description: guild is able to set role icons

properties.name: SEVEN_DAY_THREAD_ARCHIVE
properties.description: guild has access to the seven day archive time for threads

properties.name: THREE_DAY_THREAD_ARCHIVE
properties.description: guild has access to the three day archive time for threads

properties.name: TICKETED_EVENTS_ENABLED
properties.description: guild has enabled ticketed events

properties.name: VANITY_URL
properties.description: guild has access to set a vanity URL

properties.name: VERIFIED
properties.description: guild is verified

properties.name: VIP_REGIONS
properties.description: guild has access to set 384kbps bitrate in voice (previously VIP voice servers)

properties.name: WELCOME_SCREEN_ENABLED
properties.description: guild has enabled the welcome screen

name: Example Welcome Screen
description: Giving the member a role will bypass Membership Screening as well as the guild's verification level, giving the member immediate access to chat. Therefore, instead of giving a role when the member joins, it is recommended to not give the role until the user is no longer `pending`.
